Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| IDT |
| HOMO |
| V oc |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid "Material Name" entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| IDT |
| HOMO |

I removed "V oc" from the list as it doesn't clearly refer to a material name. It's a property of a material, but not a material name itself.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 29,34-37 The IDT - based polymers presented deep HOMO levels and hence lead to considerably high V oc of the resulted devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| V oc |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| V oc |

The entities "HOMO levels" and "V oc" clearly refer to material properties in the context of the paragraph. "IDT" and "devices" do not directly refer to material properties and have been removed from the list.
